source:
<!--
  ## Introduction

  Embed Brid Player videos in your AMP HTML files.
--><!-- -->
<!doctype html>
<html ⚡>
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>amp-brid-player</title>
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
  <!-- ## Setup -->
  <!--
    Import the [`amp-brid-player`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-brid-player-v0.1.md) component in the header.
  -->
  <script async custom-element="amp-brid-player" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-brid-player-0.1.js"></script>
  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-brid-player/index.html">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
</head>
<body>

  <!-- ## Basic usage -->
  <!--
    Embed Brid Player videos via the `data-video` attribute.
  -->
  <amp-brid-player data-partner="264" data-player="4144" data-video="13663" layout="responsive" width="480" height="270">
</amp-brid-player>
  <!-- ## Playlist -->
  <!--
    Use the `data-playlist` attribute for displaying a playlist. For a complete list of the attributes, refer to the [official documentation](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-brid-player-v0.1.md).
  -->
  <amp-brid-player data-partner="965" data-player="724" data-playlist="1220" layout="responsive" width="480" height="270">
</amp-brid-player>
</body></html>

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

Embed Brid Player videos in your AMP HTML files.

</head>
<body>

<amp-brid-player data-partner="264"
  data-player="4144"
  data-video="13663"
  layout="responsive"
  width="480"
  height="270">
</amp-brid-player>
